overview: Jobs? Never!! is an intimate glimpse into the soul of the  40-year-old legendary skater and iconoclast Jim Greco. Shot on  Super 16mm & 35mm, this short-film follows Greco as he navigates through his days: living, skating, falling and dreaming in Los Angeles.
tagline: Supra footwear presents a new film by Jim Greco, Jobs? Never!!
title: Jobs? Never!!
